other_tests.findings: Heterozygous single-nucleotide change (617G>A; R206H) in ACVR1 gene.

Malformations in feet, hands, spine, and extremities, including hallux valgus, extra ossification center in the first metatarsal, marked hypoplasia of the proximal phalanx, and hypertrophy of cervical vertebrae.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Findings seemed to worsen over time in second patient, showing more severe characteristics than in the first patient.

other_tests.findings: No cartilaginous fusions of the posterior elements of the cervical vertebrae; no inflammatory processes detected.
